To the chief Musician<S>5329</S> on Neginoth<S>5058</S>, A Psalm<S>4210</S> or Song<S>7892</S>. God<S>430</S> be merciful<S>2603</S> unto us, and bless<S>1288</S> us; and cause his face<S>6440</S> to shine<S>215</S> upon us; Selah<S>5542</S>. <sup>upon: Heb. with</sup>
That thy way<S>1870</S> may be known<S>3045</S> upon earth<S>776</S>, thy saving health<S>3444</S> among all nations<S>1471</S>.
Let the people<S>5971</S> praise<S>3034</S> thee, O God<S>430</S>; let all the people<S>5971</S> praise<S>3034</S> thee.
O let the nations<S>3816</S> be glad<S>8055</S> and sing for joy<S>7442</S>: for thou shalt judge<S>8199</S> the people<S>5971</S> righteously<S>4334</S>, and govern<S>5148</S> the nations<S>3816</S> upon earth<S>776</S>. Selah<S>5542</S>. <sup>govern: Heb. lead</sup>
Let the people<S>5971</S> praise<S>3034</S> thee, O God<S>430</S>; let all the people<S>5971</S> praise<S>3034</S> thee.
Then shall the earth<S>776</S> yield<S>5414</S> her increase<S>2981</S>; and God<S>430</S>, even our own God<S>430</S>, shall bless<S>1288</S> us.
God<S>430</S> shall bless<S>1288</S> us; and all the ends<S>657</S> of the earth<S>776</S> shall fear<S>3372</S> him.
